actions.committee: Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Labor and Public Welfare.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for a study with regard to histoplasmosis.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to conduct a research program with regard to the diagnosis and treatment of histoplasmosis and ocular histoplasmosis. Authorizes, for fiscal years 1975-1977, specified sums to be appropriated for the research programs and for conducting training programs.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide for a study with regard to histoplasmosis.
